definition: a loud utterance, to utter or declare in a very loud voice
details:
noun
- a loud utterance
= example: a loud utterance
= synonyms: call
- a loud utterance of emotion, especially when inarticulate
= example: a loud utterance of emotion, especially when inarticulate
= synonyms: cry
verb
- to utter or declare in a very loud voice
= example: to utter or declare in a very loud voice
= synonyms: scream
- to utter a sudden loud cry
= example: to utter a sudden loud cry
= synonyms: call
